mapper.select: SELECT n.seq_notice AS seqNotice, d.doctor_name AS doctorName, a.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName, date_format(n.notice_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS noticeWriteDate, n.notice_subject AS noticeSubject, n.notice_content AS noticeContent FROM notice AS n JOIN animalhospital AS a ON n.seq_doctor = a.seq_doctor JOIN doctor AS d ON n.seq_doctor =d.seq_doctor WHERE n.seq_notice = #{seq_notice} GROUP BY n.seq_notice
